question: One of your friend lives in another country. You want to spend time working in that country. Write a letter to your friends.In your letter, you should:•	describe why you want to work in that country;•	tell him/her about your skills and experience;•	ask some questions related to work (wage, salary)
text: Hope you’re doing well. It’s been quite a long time since I’ve been writing to you. I’ve been busy all this time  looking for a job. You know it’s a big deal to find a good job in our town.
I’ve made a decision to remove to your city – Almaty. Almaty is the biggest city in our country. So that, I hope, I’ll have an opportunity to find a job there in my specialization.

As you know I’ve finished an MBA in finance. During my study, I’d been working in a volunteer job in the Department of Statistics. In this job I’d been doing different social and financial analyses, hopefully ,this knowledge will be useful for a future job. Additionally, during the study period I’d been improving my English, so, I hope, this will be helpful too.

Please, could you help me to choose the most popular recruiting agency in Almaty? There are so many testimonials, that it’s very difficult to read all of them. And to avoid doing a wrong choice, I’m counting on your support in this question. If you know some organisations, which looking for financial analysts, please let me know.
I’m looking forward to hearing from you,
